de.upb.t2t.control.gui.settings

Class SettingsStage

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.stage.Window
      • javafx.stage.Stage
        • de.upb.t2t.control.gui.settings.SettingsStage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class SettingsStage
extends javafx.stage.Stage
    The stage displaying the application's configurable settings. It can be accessed from the MainTranscriptionPane's menu.
    Author:
    Michel May (michel-may@gmx.de)

    • Method Detail

      • onOk

        private void onOk(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        Should be called when the Ok button is pressed. Will save all changes.
        Parameters:
        e - the ActionEvent.

      • onCancel

        private void onCancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        Should be called when the Cancel button is pressed. Will discard all changes.
        Parameters:
        e - the ActionEvent.

      • onRestoreDefaults

        private void onRestoreDefaults(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        Should be called when the Restore Defaults button is pressed. Will reset all values to those held in the MainController.defaultProperties object.
        Parameters:
        e - the ActionEvent.

        public void hide()
        A wrapper for the super-type function that will additionally call MainController.unregisterSettingsStage().
